page.title: 06Margam Park. Visitor Survey
page.content: Between 1980 - 1984 visitor figures increased from 100,000 - 250,000. A survey of visitors was undertaken. A total of 849 people in 173 groups were interviewed. Nearly three quarters (75%) of visitor groups to Margam are on day trips. Over half of all groups consist of married people with children (64%). The average group size is four persons. The majority of all groups live in or are staying in, Mid or West Glamorgan. Nearly half (48%) of tourist groups come from London and the South east. Only 6% of tourist groups come from Wales.
